recipe.ingredients: 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed,1 can (5 ounces) tuna in water, drained,1 medium red bell pepper, diced,1/2 cucumber, diced,1/4 red onion, thinly sliced,2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley,1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil,1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice,1/2 teaspoon dried oregano,Salt and pepper to taste
recipe.directions: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, tuna, diced red bell pepper, diced cucumber, and sliced red onion. Toss well to mix.,In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to create a dressing.,Pour the dressing over the salad and toss again to coat everything evenly. Sprinkle with chopped parsley and gently mix.,Allow the salad to sit for about 10 minutes before serving to let the flavors marry. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
